# Install and Load Required Libraries
```{r}
options(repos=c(CRAN="https://cran.r-project.org"))
install.packages("forecast")
install.packages("readr")
install.packages("stats")
install.packages("tseries")
install.packages("lmtest")
library(forecast)
library(readr)
library(forecast)
library(stats)
library(tseries)
library(lmtest)
```
